ingredients.item: 1 pack 6 essential Waitrose British Chicken Thigh Fillets, each cut into 4
1 Waitrose Fennel Bulb, halved and sliced
500g essential Waitrose New Potatoes, cut into 2cm dice
Zest and juice of 1 essential Waitrose Lemon

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the chicken, fennel and potatoes, covered, for 5 minutes. Add the flour and cook for 30 seconds.

Gradually blend in the stock, lemon zest and juice and bring to the boil. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat and the potatoesÂ are tender. Season, stir in the chives and serve.
